file  chirp_matrix.h [code]
 

Stores very large distributed matrices.


file  chirp_protocol.h [code]
 

This file defines the binary values mandated by the Chirp Protocol specification, used by both the client and server implementations of the protocol.


file  chirp_recursive.h [code]
 

A high level interface to put and get large directories trees to and from Chirp servers.

The primary user API for accessing Chirp servers.
